text: Gardzienice is a small village in Lublin Voivodeship. The Centre for Theatre Practices was started there in 1977 by WÅ‚odzimierz Staniewski. It does research, arts, music, and cultural investigation into the humanities. It is supported by the Polish Ministry of Culture and National Heritage. ==References== Category:Villages in Lublin Voivodeship Category:Theatres Category:Polish culture
